sentence: Hailing his name recognition, media chops, and medical background to take it to the failed health advisers in Washington, D.C., Dr. Mehmet Oz told Newsmax he is the Pennsylvania Senate GOP primary candidate who can beat the Democrat in the general election next November.
author: Eric Mack
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: 'Pennsylvania Deserves a Big Voice, a Strong Voice'

sentence: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: 'Pennsylvania Deserves a Big Voice, a Strong Voice' (Newsmax's "Spicer & Co.") By Eric Mack | Thursday, 03 February 2022 11:44 PM Hailing his name recognition, media chops, and medical background to take it to the failed health advisers in Washington, D.C., Dr. Mehmet Oz told Newsmax he is the Pennsylvania Senate GOP primary candidate who can beat the Democrat in the general election next November.
author: NationalWatch
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: ‘Pennsylvania Deserves a Big Voice, a Strong Voice’

sentence: Senatorial candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz, R-Pa., told Newsmax on Tuesday night that campaigning has taught him Pennsylvanians know what's needed in Washington.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: I'm Listening to Pennsylvanians

sentence: Television personality and U.S. Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz told Newsmax on Friday that energy is ''the big issue'' in Pennsylvania, where he is running, as it is across the country.
author: Charles Kim
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Energy Is 'Big Issue' in Pennsylvania Senate Campaign

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz told Newsmax on Saturday that politicians in Washington, D.C., do not hold the same values as Pennsylvania's electorate.
author: Nick Koutsobinas
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: DC Politicians Lack Values of Their Constituents

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, a Republican candidate for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania, told Newsmax on Friday that the Biden administration is "getting it wrong" on energy policy and consistently caving to "woke radical environmentalists."
author: Luca Cacciatore
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Biden Is 'Getting It Wrong' on Energy Policy

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania as a Republican, told Newsmax on Thursday that he was asked a day earlier by the White House to resign or face termination from his position on the President's Council on Sports, Fitness, & Nutrition.
author: Luca Cacciatore
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Removal From WH Fitness Council Politically Motivated

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz, who is running as a Republican for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania, told Newsmax on Wednesday that the Democratic Party's Green New Deal agenda is "a hoax, a fraud" and "can't be done in the timeline that's described."
author: Luca Cacciatore
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: 'The Green New Deal Is a Hoax, a Fraud'

sentence: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention "wasn't taking advice from doctors" during the pandemic, so it made little sense to take its advice on schools from the teachers' unions, television's Dr. Mehmet Oz, a GOP candidate for the U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania, said Thursday on Newsmax.
author: Sandy Fitzgerald
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: CDC Took School Advice From Unions, Not Doctors

sentence: Trump also made an exclusive backstage announcement of an official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary.
author: Eric Mack
title: Donald Trump to Newsmax: Remember, Nancy Pelosi Was in Charge of Security on Jan. 6

sentence: Trump also made an exclusive backstage announcement of an official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary.
author: Eric Mack
title: Donald Trump to Newsmax: Remember, Nancy Pelosi Was in Charge of Security on Jan. 6

author: NationalWatch
title: Mehmet Oz to Newsmax: Trump Endorsement ‘Massive’ in Senate Primary

sentence: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Time for Americans to "Get Back to Reality' on COVID (Newsmax/"National Report") By Sandy Fitzgerald | Wednesday, 20 April 2022 03:36 PM Now that a federal judge has lifted the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's mask mandate for planes and other forms of transportation, it's important to "let America get back to reality" and learn to travel without masks, Dr. Mehmet Oz, now a GOP candidate for the U.S. Senate race in Pennsylvania, told Newsmax Wednesday.
author: NationalWatch
title: Dr. Oz to Newsmax: Time for Americans to “Get Back to Reality’ on COVID

sentence: David McCormick to Newsmax: Trump Endorsing Oz Won't Stop Me From Winning (Newsmax's "America Right Now") By Eric Mack | Saturday, 23 April 2022 01:49 PM While former President Donald Trump is popular in his state and the endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz "matters," Pennsylvania Senate GOP primary candidate David McCormick told Newsmax it will not keep him from winning on May 18.
author: NationalWatch
title: David McCormick to Newsmax: Trump Endorsing Oz Won’t Stop Me From Winning
